lines.text: And what are you doing walking around like that, with no top on?
I'm free, I'm proud, I'm woman!
You're fired! You're fired from everywhere! You're fired from the fucking universe!
Well shoot, I don't want to go to jail, there are lesbians there.
I always thought that was one of the advantages.
My babies! My beautiful babies!
Honey, if I wanted a thinking receptionist, you'd be working at Burger King.
OK now, listen carefully,Dr. Lorca, he was arrested earlier today, he told the police that you helped him steal the freak from Mr. Lazar here.
That, that fucker.
He told the police that you were the one that stuck a gun in Mr. Lazar's face, and left him handcuffed to a tree.
Not-uh, not me, all I did was I...
He said the whole thing was your idea.
Oh God, oh God, oh God, oh God, oh God.
I'm sorry baby, but it looks like jail for you.
Doc's a respective man, you're... not, he's cutting a deal right now, you know it'll go a lot easier if you were to just, if you just confess!
No, no, I swear on my honor, cross my heart and hope to die, all I did was just tell him about, about the specimen, I didn't know nothin else.
And I put up with your typing for three years, because I thought you were too stupid to stab me in the back, you're fired, you're fired from everywhere, you're fired from the fucking universe.
Huh?
The police don't know anything about Dr. Lorca, I lied to you.
Yeah, yeah
[laughing]
, well, well, I lied to you too
[Ms. Yost slaps her]
, Ow.
You ungrateful little poon-dog.
Well, it was all your fault, you broke your word to Dr. Lorca, he was supposed to have first dibs
And what are you? defender of the fucking public morals?
You're an evil corrupt person,
[then turns her attention to Detective Kantor]
she takes drugs, she doesn't wear any panties, she, she, she has sex in her office with all these men all on her desk.
You ungrateful little poodle.
[pushes Elvina into a chair and starts slapping her]
Ladies, ladies, ladies, fucking ladies knock it off!
[he pulls Ms. Yost off of Elvina]
Ms. Yost, hey Ms. Yost, normally, I'm all in for a good cat-fight, but seeing how you're paying me a 160 dollars an hour for my time, you might want to consider calling this one a draw for right now.
If he can hear you, why is he knocking at all? why doesn't he just answer?
Maybe he's a deaf-mute.
Elvina, if you were deaf, how could he hear the questions?
Well maybe he, I don't know.
Now, listen, carefully everyone, no one is leaving here til my specimens are returned.
What!, Me too?

[being sarcastic]
Oh, no, you can go.
Oh, thank God, so then how do I get out outta here?

[interrupting]
She was being sarcastic you moron.
Huh?
[looks to Sheila, Sheila nods]
Well, that's not very funny.
Wait! there's nothing a value in there.

[pulling the cooler with the specimen inside out of the car]
Where you going? The beach?
It's um, it's a biological specimen, it's, it's dangerous, contagious.
Wow, cool, this is going to be a real icebreaker party.

[at Dr. Lorca]
Did you have the right for your vixen to waylay me?
I never saw you before in my life, froggy.
Slut, you cheap slut.
hey, now slut I don't mind, but I'm a costly slut, deal with it, ribbit.
